item.title: 1,000 days and counting: Protest for AIIMS in Raichur intensifies
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: The Raichur AIIMS Horata Samiti's ongoing protest for a medical institution marked its 1,000th day on Feb 5.The organisation, campaigning for an All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), is highlighting the vital need for better medical facilities in Raichur and surrounding districts, addressing the fundamental right to proper healthcare.Minister NS Bosaraju stated that over 50% of the population in Raichur belongs to underprivileged communities, experiencing significant healthca...]]>
item.author: Tnn, Chamaraj Savadi
